title: 5 x 5 x 5 - (5 speakers for 5 minutes with 5 slides)
segmentation: Four years ago we have been in shock.
The year 2009 is the cinnamon for the financial crisis and the reason is September 15, 2008 and Lehman Brothers.
But on September 24, 2009, we launched here in Slovenia Challenge Future.
My peers from the business and Financial world advised me just to postpone for another year because it will be much better.
But what I learned in the past four years is that each and every year was just more difficult.
So what they learn from the challenge future is each and every moment is just the right moment to start.
The idea about the challenge future was another shock for my network.
My husband and also myself.
This is something completely different that I ever done in the past.
But if maybe I didn't understand the time.
I do understand now.
The reason is that we all have the dreams when we are children, but.
At time we don't have skills we don't have knowledge.
By the time that we obtain skills and knowledge and experience and wisdom, we already killed dreams inside of us.
As Pablo Coelho said, instead to start a good fight for these dreams to make true, we start a battle within ourselves and we kill our soul.
What I learned from the challenge future and from my dear friend from Singapore Lighthawk is the following.
It isn't failure that hurt us the most, but fear of failure does the greatest damage.
And based on that, we started on the September 24th exactly 4 years ago in Slovenia, the Czech.
On shooter but before that we went to New York to show to investors, Partners, sponsors.
It was immensely positive feedback so long that they didn't realize that we are actually planning to do out of Slovenia.
And their prediction was please don't do that.
You will not convince and reach even 2030 countries.
Sorry, Slovenia was never the center of the power.
But in the first month we reach 81 countries in first year 165.
And we are still around.
You can see the faces here and what I learn from this experience is that each and every place is just the right place to start.
So what is then the limit?
It's only the Sky, the limit.
And my question would be, does this business proverb really working also for Slovenia?
For all those not being born here in Slovenia must explain that the critical, beautiful, slow in mind would first examine where is the beginning of the Sky?
But for those being born in Slovenia, I would like to remind you that the people that lived here millennia ago an centuries ago, then a marvelous things, and for them the Sky was not the limit.
Even not universe here in Slovenia.
They found the oldest 50,000 years old flute they found, the oldest whale and they found all this map of the space.
And even in here in Slovenia, the person who actually made possible space travel, northern Potocnik has been born.
So I would like to finish with what I learned from the visit of the TV crew from United States when they went to churn across came the birds birdtown autonomous.
They wanted to see this amazing infrastructure that is delivering such World Championships and they turn around and ask.
That's it.
And the answer to this simple question is not allowing an excuse to anyone not to start with dreams this moment here, and with the wildest dreams, because the answer is yes, that's it.
